        java.util.List<java.lang.String> saveNewConfiguration​(java.util.List<AntiPattern> antiPatterns,
                                                      java.lang.String configurationName,
                                                      java.lang.String[] antiPatternNames,
                                                      java.lang.String[] thresholdNames,
                                                      java.lang.String[] thresholdValues,
                                                      boolean fullNewConfiguration)
        Method for saving new configuration to the map structure and json file
        Parameters:
        antiPatterns - List of all anti-patterns
        configurationName - Configuration name
        antiPatternNames - List of anti-pattern names
        thresholdNames - List of threshold names
        thresholdValues - List of threshold values
        fullNewConfiguration - True if the whole new configuration is created
        Returns:
        List of incorrectly set values
